markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ten-Foot Pole](/Equipment.aspx?ID=56)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 291 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1 cp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When wielding this long pole, you can use [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) to search a square up to 10 feet away. The pole is not sturdy enough to use as a weapon.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ten-Foot Pole
